00031 
00048 int FSAL_handlecmp( fsal_handle_t * handle1, fsal_handle_t * handle2,
00049                     fsal_status_t * status ){
00050    
00051   
00052   *status =  FSAL_STATUS_NO_ERROR;
00053    
00054   if (!handle1 || !handle2 ){
00055     status->major = ERR_FSAL_FAULT ;
00056     return -1;   
00057   }  
00058   
00059   return (handle1->id != handle2->id) || (handle1->ts != handle2->ts);
00060        
00061 }

00063 
00078 unsigned int FSAL_Handle_to_HashIndex( fsal_handle_t * p_handle,
00079                                     unsigned int cookie,
00080                                     unsigned int alphabet_len,
00081                                     unsigned int index_size)
00082 {
00083         unsigned int h;
00084         h = ( cookie * alphabet_len + ((unsigned int)p_handle->id ^ (unsigned int)p_handle->ts) );
00085         return ( 3 * h + 1999 ) % index_size;
00086 }
00087 
00088 
00089 /*
00090  * FSAL_Handle_to_RBTIndex
00091  * This function is used for generating a RBT node ID
00092  * in order to identify entries into the RBT.
00093  *
00094  * \param p_handle      The handle to be hashed
00095  * \param cookie        Makes it possible to have different hash value for the
00096  *                      same handle, when cookie changes.
00097  *
00098  * \return The hash value
00099  */
00100 
00101 unsigned int FSAL_Handle_to_RBTIndex( fsal_handle_t * p_handle, unsigned int cookie )
00102 {
00103 #define MAGIC   0xABCD1234
00104         unsigned int h;
00105         h = ( cookie ^ (unsigned int)p_handle->id ^ (unsigned int)p_handle->ts ^ MAGIC );
00106         return h;
00107 }

00127 fsal_status_t FSAL_DigestHandle(
00128     fsal_export_context_t  * p_expcontext,      /* IN */
00129     fsal_digesttype_t        output_type,        /* IN */
00130     fsal_handle_t         *  p_in_fsal_handle,     /* IN */
00131     caddr_t                  out_buff            /* OUT */
00132 ){
00133   /* sanity checks */
00134   if (!p_in_fsal_handle || !out_buff || !p_expcontext) ReturnCode( ERR_FSAL_FAULT ,0 );
00135   
00136   switch(output_type){   
00137     
00138     /* NFSV2 handle digest */    
00139     case  FSAL_DIGEST_NFSV2:
00140 
00141 #ifndef _NO_CHECKS
00142       /* sanity check about output size */
00143       
00144       if ( sizeof(fsal_u64_t) + sizeof(int) > FSAL_DIGEST_SIZE_HDLV2 )
00145         ReturnCode( ERR_FSAL_TOOSMALL, 0 );
00146 #endif
00147       memset( out_buff, 0,FSAL_DIGEST_SIZE_HDLV2 );
00148       memcpy( out_buff, p_in_fsal_handle, sizeof(fsal_u64_t) + sizeof(int) );
00149       break;
00150 
00151     /* NFSV3 handle digest */    
00152     case  FSAL_DIGEST_NFSV3:
00153       
00154 #ifndef _NO_CHECKS
00155       /* sanity check about output size */
00156       
00157       if ( sizeof(fsal_u64_t) + sizeof(int) > FSAL_DIGEST_SIZE_HDLV3 )
00158         ReturnCode( ERR_FSAL_TOOSMALL, 0 );
00159 #endif
00160       memset( out_buff, 0, FSAL_DIGEST_SIZE_HDLV3 );
00161       memcpy( out_buff, p_in_fsal_handle, sizeof(fsal_u64_t) + sizeof(int) );
00162       break;
00163       
00164     /* NFSV4 handle digest */    
00165     case  FSAL_DIGEST_NFSV4:
00166 
00167 #ifndef _NO_CHECKS
00168       /* sanity check about output size */
00169       
00170       if ( sizeof(fsal_u64_t) + sizeof(int) > FSAL_DIGEST_SIZE_HDLV4 )
00171         ReturnCode( ERR_FSAL_TOOSMALL, 0 );
00172 #endif
00173       memset( out_buff, 0, FSAL_DIGEST_SIZE_HDLV4 );
00174       memcpy( out_buff, p_in_fsal_handle, sizeof(fsal_u64_t) + sizeof(int) );
00175       break;
00176 
00177 
00178     /* FileId digest for NFSv2 */
00179     case  FSAL_DIGEST_FILEID2:      
00180       
00181 #ifndef _NO_CHECKS
00182       /* sanity check about output size */
00183       
00184       if ( sizeof(ino_t) > FSAL_DIGEST_SIZE_FILEID2 )
00185         ReturnCode( ERR_FSAL_TOOSMALL, 0 );
00186 #endif
00187       memset( out_buff, 0, FSAL_DIGEST_SIZE_FILEID2 );
00188       memcpy( out_buff, &(p_in_fsal_handle->info.inode), sizeof(ino_t) );
00189       
00190       break;
00191       
00192       
00193     /* FileId digest for NFSv3 */
00194     case  FSAL_DIGEST_FILEID3:
00195       
00196 #ifndef _NO_CHECKS
00197       /* sanity check about output size */
00198       
00199       if ( sizeof(ino_t) > FSAL_DIGEST_SIZE_FILEID3 )
00200         ReturnCode( ERR_FSAL_TOOSMALL, 0 );
00201 #endif
00202       memset( out_buff, 0, FSAL_DIGEST_SIZE_FILEID3 );
00203       memcpy( out_buff, &(p_in_fsal_handle->info.inode), sizeof(ino_t) );
00204       break;
00205       
00206       
00207     /* FileId digest for NFSv4 */
00208       
00209     case  FSAL_DIGEST_FILEID4:
00210 
00211 #ifndef _NO_CHECKS
00212       /* sanity check about output size */
00213       
00214       if ( sizeof(ino_t) > FSAL_DIGEST_SIZE_FILEID4 )
00215         ReturnCode( ERR_FSAL_TOOSMALL, 0 );
00216 #endif
00217       memset( out_buff, 0,FSAL_DIGEST_SIZE_FILEID4 );
00218       memcpy( out_buff, &(p_in_fsal_handle->info.inode), sizeof(ino_t) );
00219       break;      
00220     
00221     /* Nodetype digest. */
00222     case FSAL_DIGEST_NODETYPE:  
00223       
00224 #ifndef _NO_CHECKS
00225       
00226       if ( sizeof(fsal_nodetype_t) > FSAL_DIGEST_SIZE_NODETYPE )
00227         ReturnCode( ERR_FSAL_TOOSMALL, 0 );
00228 #endif
00229       memset( out_buff,0,FSAL_DIGEST_SIZE_NODETYPE );
00230       memcpy( out_buff, &(p_in_fsal_handle->info.ftype),sizeof(fsal_nodetype_t) );
00231       break;
00232     default:
00233       ReturnCode( ERR_FSAL_SERVERFAULT ,0 );
00234 
00235   }
00236       
00237   ReturnCode(ERR_FSAL_NO_ERROR,0);
00238   
00239 }

00242 
00258 fsal_status_t FSAL_ExpandHandle(
00259     fsal_export_context_t  * p_expcontext,    /* IN */
00260     fsal_digesttype_t        in_type,         /* IN */
00261     caddr_t                  in_buff,         /* IN */
00262     fsal_handle_t          * p_out_fsal_handle  /* OUT */
00263 ){
00264   
00265   /* sanity checks */
00266   if (!p_out_fsal_handle || !in_buff || !p_expcontext) ReturnCode( ERR_FSAL_FAULT ,0 );
00267   
00268   switch(in_type){   
00269     
00270     /* NFSV2 handle digest */    
00271     case  FSAL_DIGEST_NFSV2:
00272       memset( p_out_fsal_handle, 0,sizeof(fsal_handle_t) );
00273       memcpy( p_out_fsal_handle, in_buff, sizeof(fsal_u64_t) + sizeof(int) );
00274       break;
00275 
00276     /* NFSV3 handle digest */    
00277     case  FSAL_DIGEST_NFSV3:
00278       memset( p_out_fsal_handle, 0,sizeof(fsal_handle_t) );
00279       memcpy( p_out_fsal_handle, in_buff, sizeof(fsal_u64_t) + sizeof(int) );
00280       break;
00281       
00282     /* NFSV4 handle digest */    
00283     case  FSAL_DIGEST_NFSV4:
00284       memset( p_out_fsal_handle, 0,sizeof(fsal_handle_t) );
00285       memcpy( p_out_fsal_handle, in_buff, sizeof(fsal_u64_t) + sizeof(int) );
00286       break;
00287 
00288     default:
00289       ReturnCode( ERR_FSAL_SERVERFAULT ,0 );
00290   }
00291   
00292   ReturnCode(ERR_FSAL_NO_ERROR,0);  
00293   
00294 }

00299 
00307 fsal_status_t  FSAL_SetDefault_FSAL_parameter(
00308                              fsal_parameter_t *  out_parameter )
00309 {
00310 
00311   log_t   no_logging = LOG_INITIALIZER;
00312   
00313   /* defensive programming... */  
00314   if ( out_parameter == NULL )
00315       ReturnCode( ERR_FSAL_FAULT, 0 );
00316   
00317   /* init logging to no logging */  
00318   out_parameter->fsal_info.log_outputs = no_logging;
00319   
00320   /* init max FS calls = unlimited */
00321   out_parameter->fsal_info.max_fs_calls = 0;
00322 
00323   ReturnCode( ERR_FSAL_NO_ERROR, 0 );    
00324   
00325 }

00328 fsal_status_t  FSAL_SetDefault_FS_common_parameter(
00329                              fsal_parameter_t *  out_parameter )
00330 {
00331   /* defensive programming... */  
00332   if ( out_parameter == NULL )
00333       ReturnCode( ERR_FSAL_FAULT, 0 );
00334   
00335   /* set default values for all parameters of fs_common_info */
00336   
00337   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( out_parameter->fs_common_info, maxfilesize );
00338   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( out_parameter->fs_common_info, maxlink );
00339   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( out_parameter->fs_common_info, maxnamelen );
00340   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( out_parameter->fs_common_info, maxpathlen );
00341   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( out_parameter->fs_common_info, no_trunc );
00342   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( out_parameter->fs_common_info, chown_restricted );
00343   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( out_parameter->fs_common_info, case_insensitive );
00344   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( out_parameter->fs_common_info, case_preserving );
00345   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( out_parameter->fs_common_info, fh_expire_type );
00346   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( out_parameter->fs_common_info, link_support );
00347   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( out_parameter->fs_common_info, symlink_support );  
00348   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( out_parameter->fs_common_info, lock_support );  
00349   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( out_parameter->fs_common_info, named_attr );
00350   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( out_parameter->fs_common_info, unique_handles );
00351   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( out_parameter->fs_common_info, lease_time );
00352   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( out_parameter->fs_common_info, acl_support );
00353   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( out_parameter->fs_common_info, cansettime );
00354   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( out_parameter->fs_common_info, homogenous );
00355   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( out_parameter->fs_common_info, supported_attrs );
00356   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( out_parameter->fs_common_info, maxread );
00357   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( out_parameter->fs_common_info, maxwrite );
00358   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( out_parameter->fs_common_info, umask );
00359   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( out_parameter->fs_common_info, auth_exportpath_xdev );
00360   FSAL_SET_INIT_DEFAULT( out_parameter->fs_common_info, xattr_access_rights );
00361 
00362   
00363   ReturnCode( ERR_FSAL_NO_ERROR, 0 );  
00364     
00365 }

00370 fsal_status_t  FSAL_SetDefault_FS_specific_parameter(
00371                              fsal_parameter_t *  out_parameter )
00372 {
00373   /* defensive programming... */  
00374   if ( out_parameter == NULL )
00375       ReturnCode( ERR_FSAL_FAULT, 0 );
00376   
00377   /* set default values for all parameters of fs_specific_info */
00378 
00379 #ifdef _USE_PGSQL
00380 
00381   /* pgsql db */
00382   strcpy(out_parameter->fs_specific_info.dbparams.host, "localhost" );
00383   strcpy(out_parameter->fs_specific_info.dbparams.port, "5432" );
00384   out_parameter->fs_specific_info.dbparams.dbname[0]='\0';
00385   out_parameter->fs_specific_info.dbparams.login[0]='\0';
00386   out_parameter->fs_specific_info.dbparams.passwdfile[0]='\0';
00387 
00388 #elif defined(_USE_MYSQL)
00389 
00390   strcpy(out_parameter->fs_specific_info.dbparams.host, "localhost" );
00391   strcpy(out_parameter->fs_specific_info.dbparams.port, "" );
00392   out_parameter->fs_specific_info.dbparams.dbname[0]='\0';
00393   out_parameter->fs_specific_info.dbparams.login[0]='\0';
00394   out_parameter->fs_specific_info.dbparams.passwdfile[0]='\0';
00395 
00396 #endif
00397 
00398   ReturnCode( ERR_FSAL_NO_ERROR, 0 );  
00399   
00400 }

00405 
00428 /* load FSAL init info */
00429  
00430 fsal_status_t  FSAL_load_FSAL_parameter_from_conf(
00431       config_file_t       in_config,
00432       fsal_parameter_t *  out_parameter
00433     )
00434 {
00435   int     err;
00436   int     var_max, var_index;
00437   char *  key_name;
00438   char *  key_value;  
00439   config_item_t   block;
00440   
00441   int  DebugLevel   = -1;
00442   char * LogFile    = NULL;
00443 
00444   
00445   block = config_FindItemByName( in_config, CONF_LABEL_FSAL );
00446 
00447   /* cannot read item */  
00448   
00449   if ( block == NULL )
00450   {
00451     DisplayLog("FSAL LOAD PARAMETER: Cannot read item \"%s\" from configuration file",
00452         CONF_LABEL_FSAL );
00453     ReturnCode( ERR_FSAL_NOENT, 0 );
00454   }
00455   else if ( config_ItemType(block) != CONFIG_ITEM_BLOCK )
00456   {
00457     DisplayLog("FSAL LOAD PARAMETER: Item \"%s\" is expected to be a block",
00458         CONF_LABEL_FSAL );
00459      ReturnCode( ERR_FSAL_INVAL, 0 );
00460   }
00461       
00462   /* read variable for fsal init */
00463   
00464   var_max = config_GetNbItems( block );
00465   
00466   for ( var_index = 0; var_index < var_max ; var_index ++ )
00467   {    
00468     config_item_t item;
00469     
00470     item = config_GetItemByIndex( block, var_index );
00471     
00472     err = config_GetKeyValue( 
00473                         item,
00474                         &key_name,
00475                         &key_value
00476                        );
00477     if ( err ){
00478       DisplayLog("FSAL LOAD PARAMETER: ERROR reading key[%d] from section \"%s\" of configuration file.",
00479             var_index, CONF_LABEL_FSAL );
00480       ReturnCode( ERR_FSAL_SERVERFAULT, err );
00481     }
00482         
00483     if ( !STRCMP( key_name, "DebugLevel" ) )
00484     {
00485       DebugLevel = ReturnLevelAscii( key_value );
00486       
00487       if ( DebugLevel == -1 ){
00488         DisplayLog("FSAL LOAD PARAMETER: ERROR: Invalid debug level name: \"%s\".",
00489               key_value );
00490         ReturnCode( ERR_FSAL_INVAL, -1 );        
00491       }
00492       
00493     }
00494     else if ( !STRCMP( key_name, "LogFile" ) )
00495     {
00496       
00497       LogFile = key_value ;
00498       
00499     }
00500     else if ( !STRCMP( key_name, "Max_FS_calls" ) )
00501     {
00502       
00503         int maxcalls = s_read_int( key_value );
00504 
00505         if ( maxcalls < 0 )
00506         {
00507           DisplayLog("FSAL LOAD PARAMETER: ERROR: Unexpected value for %s: null or positive integer expected.",key_name);
00508           ReturnCode( ERR_FSAL_INVAL, 0 );
00509         }
00510            
00511         out_parameter->fsal_info.max_fs_calls = (unsigned int) maxcalls;
00512       
00513     }
00514     else
00515     {
00516       DisplayLog("FSAL LOAD PARAMETER: ERROR: Unknown or unsettable key: %s (item %s)",
00517           key_name, CONF_LABEL_FSAL ) ;
00518       ReturnCode( ERR_FSAL_INVAL, 0 );
00519     }
00520 
00521   }
00522   
00523   /* init logging */
00524   
00525   if ( LogFile )
00526   {
00527     desc_log_stream_t  log_stream;
00528     
00529     strcpy( log_stream.path , LogFile );
00530     
00531     /* Default : NIV_CRIT */
00532     
00533     if ( DebugLevel == -1 )
00534       AddLogStreamJd( &(out_parameter->fsal_info.log_outputs),
00535           V_FILE, log_stream, NIV_CRIT, SUP);
00536     else         
00537       AddLogStreamJd( &(out_parameter->fsal_info.log_outputs),
00538           V_FILE, log_stream, DebugLevel, SUP);
00539         
00540   }
00541 
00542   ReturnCode( ERR_FSAL_NO_ERROR, 0 );        
00543   
00544 } /* FSAL_load_FSAL_parameter_from_conf */
00545 
00546 
00547 
00548 /* load general filesystem configuration options */
00549 
00550 fsal_status_t  FSAL_load_FS_common_parameter_from_conf(
00551       config_file_t       in_config,
00552       fsal_parameter_t *  out_parameter
00553     )
00554 {
00555   int     err;
00556   int     var_max, var_index;
00557   char *  key_name;
00558   char *  key_value;  
00559   config_item_t   block;
00560   
00561   block = config_FindItemByName( in_config, CONF_LABEL_FS_COMMON );
00562   
00563   /* cannot read item */  
00564   if ( block == NULL )
00565   {
00566     DisplayLog("FSAL LOAD PARAMETER: Cannot read item \"%s\" from configuration file",
00567         CONF_LABEL_FS_COMMON );
00568     ReturnCode( ERR_FSAL_NOENT, 0 );
00569   }
00570   else if ( config_ItemType(block) != CONFIG_ITEM_BLOCK )
00571   {
00572     DisplayLog("FSAL LOAD PARAMETER: Item \"%s\" is expected to be a block",
00573         CONF_LABEL_FS_COMMON );
00574      ReturnCode( ERR_FSAL_INVAL, 0 );
00575   }
00576   
00577   /*
00578   configurable common info for filesystem are:
00579   link_support      # hardlink support
00580   symlink_support   # symlinks support
00581   cansettime        # Is it possible to change file times
00582   maxread           # Max read size from FS
00583   maxwrite          # Max write size to FS
00584   umask
00585   auth_exportpath_xdev
00586   xattr_access_rights
00587 
00588   */
00589   
00590   var_max = config_GetNbItems( block );
00591   
00592   for ( var_index = 0; var_index < var_max ; var_index ++ )
00593   {    
00594     config_item_t item;
00595     
00596     item = config_GetItemByIndex( block, var_index );
00597     
00598     err = config_GetKeyValue( 
00599                         item,
00600                         &key_name,
00601                         &key_value
00602                        );
00603     if ( err ){
00604       DisplayLog("FSAL LOAD PARAMETER: ERROR reading key[%d] from section \"%s\" of configuration file.",
00605             var_index, CONF_LABEL_FS_COMMON );
00606       ReturnCode( ERR_FSAL_SERVERFAULT, err );
00607     }
00608     
00609     /* does the variable exists ? */
00610     if ( !STRCMP( key_name, "link_support" ) )
00611       {
00612         
00613         int bool = StrToBoolean( key_value );
00614         
00615         if ( bool == -1 )
00616         {
00617           DisplayLog("FSAL LOAD PARAMETER: ERROR: Unexpected value for %s: 0 or 1 expected.",key_name);
00618           ReturnCode( ERR_FSAL_INVAL, 0 );
00619         }
00620         
00621         /* if set to false, force value to false.
00622          * else keep fs default.
00623          */
00624         FSAL_SET_INIT_INFO( out_parameter->fs_common_info, link_support,
00625             FSAL_INIT_MAX_LIMIT, bool );
00626             
00627       }
00628     else if ( !STRCMP( key_name, "symlink_support" ) )
00629       {
00630         int bool = StrToBoolean( key_value );
00631         
00632         if ( bool == -1 )
00633         {
00634           DisplayLog("FSAL LOAD PARAMETER: ERROR: Unexpected value for %s: 0 or 1 expected.",key_name);
00635           ReturnCode( ERR_FSAL_INVAL, 0 );
00636         }
00637         
00638         /* if set to false, force value to false.
00639          * else keep fs default.
00640          */
00641         FSAL_SET_INIT_INFO( out_parameter->fs_common_info, symlink_support,
00642             FSAL_INIT_MAX_LIMIT, bool );
00643       }
00644     else if ( !STRCMP( key_name, "cansettime" ) )
00645       {
00646         int bool = StrToBoolean( key_value );
00647         
00648         if ( bool == -1 )
00649         {
00650           DisplayLog("FSAL LOAD PARAMETER: ERROR: Unexpected value for %s: 0 or 1 expected.",key_name);
00651           ReturnCode( ERR_FSAL_INVAL, 0 );
00652         }
00653         
00654         /* if set to false, force value to false.
00655          * else keep fs default.
00656          */
00657         FSAL_SET_INIT_INFO( out_parameter->fs_common_info, cansettime,
00658             FSAL_INIT_MAX_LIMIT, bool );
00659         
00660       }
00661     else if ( !STRCMP( key_name, "maxread" ) )
00662       {
00663         fsal_u64_t  size;
00664         
00665         if ( s_read_int64( key_value , &size ) )
00666         {
00667           DisplayLog("FSAL LOAD PARAMETER: ERROR: Unexpected value for %s: positive integer expected.",key_name);
00668           ReturnCode( ERR_FSAL_INVAL, 0 );
00669         }
00670         
00671         FSAL_SET_INIT_INFO( out_parameter->fs_common_info, maxread,
00672             FSAL_INIT_FORCE_VALUE, size );
00673         
00674          
00675       }
00676     else if ( !STRCMP( key_name, "maxwrite" ) )
00677       {
00678         fsal_u64_t  size;
00679         
00680         if ( s_read_int64( key_value , &size ) )
00681         {
00682           DisplayLog("FSAL LOAD PARAMETER: ERROR: Unexpected value for %s: positive integer expected.",key_name);
00683           ReturnCode( ERR_FSAL_INVAL, 0 );
00684         }
00685         
00686         FSAL_SET_INIT_INFO( out_parameter->fs_common_info, maxwrite,
00687             FSAL_INIT_FORCE_VALUE, size );
00688                 
00689       }
00690     else if ( !STRCMP( key_name, "umask" ) )
00691       {
00692         int mode = s_read_octal( key_value );
00693         
00694         if ( mode < 0 )
00695         {
00696           DisplayLog("FSAL LOAD PARAMETER: ERROR: Unexpected value for %s: octal expected.",key_name);
00697           ReturnCode( ERR_FSAL_INVAL, 0 );
00698         }
00699         
00700         FSAL_SET_INIT_INFO( out_parameter->fs_common_info, umask,
00701             FSAL_INIT_FORCE_VALUE, unix2fsal_mode(mode) );
00702         
00703       }
00704     else if ( !STRCMP( key_name, "auth_xdev_export" ) )
00705       {
00706         int bool = StrToBoolean( key_value );
00707 
00708         if ( bool == -1 )
00709         {
00710           DisplayLog("FSAL LOAD PARAMETER: ERROR: Unexpected value for %s: boolean expected.",key_name);
00711           ReturnCode( ERR_FSAL_INVAL, 0 );
00712         }
00713 
00714         FSAL_SET_INIT_INFO( out_parameter->fs_common_info, auth_exportpath_xdev,
00715             FSAL_INIT_FORCE_VALUE, bool );
00716       }
00717     else if ( !STRCMP( key_name, "xattr_access_rights" ) )
00718       {
00719         int mode = s_read_octal( key_value );
00720 
00721         if ( mode < 0 )
00722         {
00723           DisplayLog("FSAL LOAD PARAMETER: ERROR: Unexpected value for %s: octal expected.",key_name);
00724           ReturnCode( ERR_FSAL_INVAL, 0 );
00725         }
00726 
00727         FSAL_SET_INIT_INFO( out_parameter->fs_common_info, xattr_access_rights,
00728             FSAL_INIT_FORCE_VALUE, unix2fsal_mode(mode) );
00729 
00730       }
00731     else
00732     {
00733       DisplayLog("FSAL LOAD PARAMETER: ERROR: Unknown or unsettable key: %s (item %s)",
00734           key_name, CONF_LABEL_FS_COMMON ) ;
00735       ReturnCode( ERR_FSAL_INVAL, 0 );
00736     }
00737         
00738   }
00739     
00740   ReturnCode( ERR_FSAL_NO_ERROR, 0 );    
00741     
00742 } /* FSAL_load_FS_common_parameter_from_conf */
00743 
00744 
00745 
00746 
00747 /* load specific filesystem configuration options */
00748 
00749 fsal_status_t  FSAL_load_FS_specific_parameter_from_conf(
00750       config_file_t       in_config,
00751       fsal_parameter_t *  out_parameter
00752     )
00753 {
00754   int     err;
00755   int     var_max, var_index;
00756   char *  key_name;
00757   char *  key_value;   
00758   config_item_t   block;
00759   
00760   block = config_FindItemByName( in_config, CONF_LABEL_FS_SPECIFIC );
00761   
00762   /* cannot read item */  
00763   if ( block == NULL )
00764   {
00765     DisplayLog("FSAL LOAD PARAMETER: Cannot read item \"%s\" from configuration file",
00766         CONF_LABEL_FS_SPECIFIC );
00767     ReturnCode( ERR_FSAL_NOENT, 0 );
00768   }
00769   else if ( config_ItemType(block) != CONFIG_ITEM_BLOCK )
00770   {
00771     DisplayLog("FSAL LOAD PARAMETER: Item \"%s\" is expected to be a block",
00772         CONF_LABEL_FS_SPECIFIC );
00773      ReturnCode( ERR_FSAL_INVAL, 0 );
00774   }
00775       
00776  
00777   var_max = config_GetNbItems( block );
00778   
00779   for ( var_index = 0; var_index < var_max ; var_index ++ )
00780   {
00781     config_item_t item;
00782     
00783     item = config_GetItemByIndex( block, var_index );
00784     
00785     err = config_GetKeyValue( 
00786                         item,
00787                         &key_name,
00788                         &key_value
00789                        );
00790     if ( err ){
00791       DisplayLog("FSAL LOAD PARAMETER: ERROR reading key[%d] from section \"%s\" of configuration file.",
00792             var_index, CONF_LABEL_FS_SPECIFIC );
00793       ReturnCode( ERR_FSAL_SERVERFAULT, err );
00794     }
00795     /* does the variable exists ? */
00796     if ( !STRCMP( key_name, "DB_Host" ) ) {        
00797         strncpy(  out_parameter->fs_specific_info.dbparams.host,
00798                   key_value,
00799                   FSAL_MAX_DBHOST_NAME_LEN);
00800     } else if ( !STRCMP( key_name, "DB_Port" ) ) {
00801         int port;
00802         port = atoi(key_value); /* XXX: replace atoi by my_atoi ?! */
00803         if (port <= 0 || port > USHRT_MAX) {
00804           DisplayLog("FSAL LOAD PARAMETER: ERROR: Unexpected value for %s: positive integer (< %i) expected.",key_name, USHRT_MAX);
00805           ReturnCode( ERR_FSAL_INVAL, 0 );
00806         }
00807         strncpy(  out_parameter->fs_specific_info.dbparams.port,
00808                   key_value,
00809                   FSAL_MAX_DBPORT_STR_LEN);
00810     } else if ( !STRCMP( key_name, "DB_Name" ) ) {        
00811         strncpy(  out_parameter->fs_specific_info.dbparams.dbname,
00812                   key_value,
00813                   FSAL_MAX_DB_NAME_LEN);
00814     } else if ( !STRCMP( key_name, "DB_Login" ) ) { 
00815         strncpy(  out_parameter->fs_specific_info.dbparams.login,
00816                   key_value,
00817                   FSAL_MAX_DB_LOGIN_LEN);
00818     } else if ( !STRCMP( key_name, "DB_keytab" ) ) {        
00819         strncpy(  out_parameter->fs_specific_info.dbparams.passwdfile,
00820                   key_value,
00821                   FSAL_MAX_PATH_LEN);
00822     } else {
00823       DisplayLog("FSAL LOAD PARAMETER: ERROR: Unknown or unsettable key: %s (item %s)",
00824           key_name, CONF_LABEL_FS_SPECIFIC ) ;
00825       ReturnCode( ERR_FSAL_INVAL, 0 );
00826     }       
00827   }  
00828    
00829   if (out_parameter->fs_specific_info.dbparams.host[0] == '\0'
00830       || out_parameter->fs_specific_info.dbparams.dbname[0] == '\0') {
00831     DisplayLog("FSAL LOAD PARAMETER: DB_Host and DB_Name MUST be specified in the configuration file",
00832         CONF_LABEL_FS_SPECIFIC );
00833     ReturnCode( ERR_FSAL_NOENT, 0 );
00834   }
00835   
00836    ReturnCode( ERR_FSAL_NO_ERROR, 0 );  
00837     
00838 } /* FSAL_load_FS_specific_parameter_from_conf */
00839
